Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

I talk about this here:
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1296421/rest-complex-applications/1297275#1297275

Notably I mention about normalizing the payload and then simply redirecting
to an existing filter.

Another concept, on top of this, is to let the users name filters.

This way you have two different domains. One is simply canonical filters
that represent specific queries, while the other is conceptual filters that
meet specific needs regardless of the actual criteria involved "Most
popular users in the last month" for example, where that definition perhaps
changes over time.

Regards,

Will Hartung
(willh@...)

--
